channel.title: 508 Password Changing
channel.description:
On my HD 508 IP Changing client, I can only use an account once. Whenever I log out or close the client, my password changes. I use the password in the .DAT file, containing my info, rights, username, etc. and still no luck.
Can anyone help me overcome this issue? Thanks in Advance Cody

item.title: 508 Password Changing
item.dc:creator: @Drcodyjones Drcodyjones
item.description:

On my HD 508 IP Changing client, I can only use an account once. Whenever I log out or close the client, my password changes. I use the password in the .DAT file, containing my info, rights, username, etc. and still no luck.

Can anyone help me overcome this issue?
Thanks in Advance
